title: Malevolence
description: Recently paroled supervillain Nicholas McHenry wants to get back in the game, cracking bank vaults and superhero skulls.But not even twenty-four hours go by before McHenry is arrested and humiliated by the world's foremost superhero team.Framed as the mastermind of a plot to take over the world, McHenry needs to clear his name with the heroes--But between him and his retribution stands an army of his villainous brethren, all of whom want him dead.
author: Alexander Maisey
